text: Bruno Scolari (29 January 1961 - 28 April 2009) was an Italian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Monza
title: Bruno Scolari
